result.execSummary:
The defendant Sarah Lynn Fonseca was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Sarah Lynn Fonseca is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Sarah Lynn Fonseca was found guilty of Possession of Methamphetamine [Modifiers: Penalties for Felonies-Class "I" Felony], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

St Croix County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Court dismisses Counts 2 - 4.
Defendant to report to Probation today July 14, 2017 no later than 3:00 p.m.
Bond continues until Defendant reports to Probation.
Court will withhold any judgment on Jail credit. Attorneys to file within 14 days.

  
In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

miscConds.notes:
Apply bond on file.
Balance of $18.00 DNA surcharge to be collected by DOC as a condition of probation in Count 1 Case #15CF554.

-Complete all other programming as deemed appropriate by the COMPAS Assessment and the Agent.
-Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. 
-Attend MRT or equivalent cognitive behavior therapy.
-NO Social Media contact regarding drug activity, Known drug users or dealers or commentary regarding Law Enforcement activities, drug interaction, enforcement or confidential informants.
-Defendant to report to the Day Report Center to provide a DNA sample.
AODA and follow any recommended treatment.

ADDRESS INFO for Sarah Lynn Fonseca
Current: 1049 1/2 Arcade St, Saint Paul, MN 55106 United States  (Effective: 07-14-2017)
Prior: 1415 Broadway Street #31, Hammond, WI 54015 United States
per Defendant's bond. hml

TO ALSO INCLUDE 16CF117, 15CM711, 15CF554 and 15TR5779:
CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA: Edward Minser   DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea   DF:  Sarah Lynn Fonseca appeared from jail. Case called at 11:37 a.m. Court notes these matters are set for a bail bond hearing. Atty Andrea states there is a resolution. Recites agreement.   Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads GUILTY to Ct 1 Possession of Methamphetamines in 15CF554. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 1 Possession of Methamphetamine in 15CF554. On motion of the State without objection, Crt dismisses Ct's 2, 3 and 4 in 15CF554, 15TR5779, 15CM711 and 16CF117.  Sentencing arguments. 20 days to file appeal. Court will withhold any judgment on jail credit. Attorney's to file any jail credit within 14 days. 

Crt orders:

-   S/W 2 years probation. Report to probation no later than 3:00 p.m. today. Bond will be converted into a signature bond and will remain in effect until reports to probation.

-   Complete all other programming as deemed appropriate by the COMPAS assessment and the Department of Corrections

-    AODA and follow any recommended treatment.

-    Court costs of $268.00. Any bond on file to apply.

-    DNA Sample and Surcharge of $250.00

-    Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. 

-    Attend MRT or equivalent cognitive behavior therapy

-   No social media contact regarding drug activity, known drug users or dealers or commentary regarding law enforcement activities, drug interdiction, enforcement or confidential informants
Atty Andrea. hml

16CF117, 15CF5544 and 15CM711

Additional cash to what is on file.

I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Day Report Center agreement on today's date. I further understand that I am required to submit to random UA testing, at least 2 times per week. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in an arrest warrant and/or referral for criminal charges.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing pursuant to the Day Report Center protocols. If UA testing is required, the same shall be viewed in the presence of an officer or deputy of the same sex. Additional testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.
